name: Ranch Rescue
description:
You and your friends just wanted to hang out near an old seemingly abandoned ranch, cause why not. Now you've all gotten captured by some crazy killer, who has left your friends hanging on hooks. Miraculously you have managed to escape the killers grasp, and must now seek to rescue your friends and escape the hellish ranch.

This is a low poly game made in Unity. 
I wanted to try and make a low poly "horror" game, so I decided on something simple.
It is a quick game, but can be quite challenging.

Please let me know what you think about the game in a comment :)
 

Everything is created by me,
except some sound effects that I obtained from zapsplat.com
